Posts.Content: Emj85 wrote: Hi I’m new to this site. My name is Emma and I’m 32 years old. I’ve recently noticed bleeding on my left nipple with aching pain aswell. I have an inverted nipple of this side also and that’s why I couldn’t breastfeed my son on this side. Pregnancy is not a possibility. It’s been bleeding a little for three days now and my husband says he feels something a bit strange like there’s more tissue than there ought to be and I feel it too. I live in the uk England but would appreciate any advice as I’m very worried. I don’t know if there’s a history of breast cancer because I’m adopted. I’m too scared to go to my doctor but have been told to go as an emergency. Is it something else it could be and my mind is playing tricks on me. Thank you so much Emma Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Newbie worried about nipple bleeding Emj85 MTwoman
